title: Head wrap/veil
description: black silk, some beading, fringe, buttons, decorative bronze metallic tape with coins at ends; one plain edge has piece of tape sewn with \"167b\"; veil has silver chain fastener, red embroidery and silver heart pendant; veil has piece of tape sewn with \"167a\"
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
